thread.title: Will raid on IS prison fuel debate on U.S. role in Iraq?
thread.title_full: Video: Will raid on IS prison fuel debate on U.S. role in Iraq? | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Will raid on IS prison fuel debate on U.S. role in Iraq?
text: American and Kurdish forces raided an Islamic State prison in Northern Iraq after learning that captives there were facing imminent execution. In all, 70 were freed, but one American soldier was killed -- the first U.S. military casualty since 2011. To learn more about the operation, Gwen Ifill speaks with Michael Gordon of The New York Times.
